meta.title: About Me - Emanuel Casco | Software Architect & Tech Lead
meta.description: Software Architect and Tech Lead specializing in climate technology, full-stack development, and technical leadership. Currently at Waterplan (YC S21).
meta.keywords: Emanuel Casco, Software Architect, Tech Lead, Climate Tech, Full Stack Developer, Waterplan

header.title: About Me
header.intro: I'm a Software Architect and Tech Lead passionate about building technology that makes a positive impact on the world. Currently leading technical development at Waterplan, a Y Combinator-backed climate tech startup focused on water sustainability.

description: Building and enhancing the world's leading all-in-one climate platform for measuring, responding to, and reporting on water risk
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and deliver high-quality software solutions
Leading architectural discussions and implementing robust solutions in short iterations
Developing data-intensive applications for environmental impact measurement to propel companies towards a water-secure world
Worked as tech leader on the payments squad for MODO, a digital wallet, alongside an incredible team
Led architectural decisions and technical strategy for payment processing systems
Mentored development teams and established best practices for scalable backend development
2018-2019: Engaged in e-commerce projects in Buenos Aires and Santiago, collaborating with distributed teams across Colombia, Mexico, India, and more
2019-2021: Contributed to various teams, designing and implementing diverse solutions with micro-services, serverless, and monolith architectures
2019-2021: Served as Node.js trainer and contributed to development of internal tools and workshops
Played a pivotal role in establishing the company's first QA department, participating in interviews and defining core procedures
Developed and maintained internal tools using Node.js, Vue.js, Express, and Sequelize to automate QA workflows
Collaborated in creating and delivering QA Tester course for Telefónica Foundation
Engineered automated regression test suites with Selenium (Ruby), boosting test coverage
Contributed to Watson IBM Chatbots design and implementation, performed SEO audits
Provided web design and graphic design services for local businesses
Created custom websites and visual identity solutions
Managed client relationships and project delivery from conception to completion
Comprehensive study of computer science fundamentals and programming principles
Learned core programming languages: C, C++, C#, Java
Web development foundations: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
System administration and Linux server management
